View on GitHub

odo on github

open source software

Erlang projects

Algorithms

  • quantile estimator for large data sets

  • SLINK nearest-neighbor cluster algorithm

Networking

  • a UDP-based network protocol for games

Worker load balancing

  • revolver - simple load balancer for Erlang processes

  • palma - create ad-hoc revolver pools

Throughput optimization

  • buffer that flushes periodically

Utilities

  • erl_prism- like htop for erlang nodes

  • ramjet - load testing framework

  • execute funs at fixed rates and measure throughput

  • log groups and tags for lager

Kafka related

  • kafka 0.6 consumer framework

  • kafka 0.6 binary search

Libraries

  • nested - manipulation of deep map structures

  • simple data validation

  • range queries for leveldb

  • hexer - efficient conversion from binary to hexadecimal
